name: requestsdebugger
description: Tool to debug failed/dropped requests at client side

scripts.build:mac: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-macos src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger RequestsDebugger-Mac
scripts.build:linux: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-linux src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger RequestsDebugger-Linux
scripts.build:win: npm install; ./node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js -t node4-win src/requestsDebugger.js; mv requestsDebugger.exe RequestsDebugger.exe
